content.detailedDescription: I stopped to take a series of pictures of the trails in the sky forming an x against a cloudy background directly towards the sun. i didn’t see the blue ball of light until after the i viewed the images. the ball appears to move and at one point it flashes a purple fringe. the blue ball of light is also covered with smaller white lights. it could be dust or some strange camera artifact but some of the images it looks like the ball is in motion.
content.summary: One blue ball of light covered with smaller white lights around chem trails.

content.detailedDescription: I got up from the couch to get a drink from the kitchen.  looking out of the kitchen window, i saw this triangle-shaped "thing" then thought to myself that i was sleepy, but i stubbed my toe trying to get out of the house to get a better look. when i got out the door, i looked up & saw the "thing" rise and shot off east at a rate of speed that was impossible to guess, but it disappeared almost immediately, and that's when i saw the black helicopter going in the same direction. the thing looked almost like the "belgium wave" craft(s), except that it didn't have a red globular center or bright white lights on the 3 corners.
content.summary: Observed grayish, triangular silent vehicle floating over our house. no emissions.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting in the hot tub about 8:30pm, wed feb. 11, 2015. noticed a large, unusual 'star' of amber color.  twp lemoore naval air station jets came by as they do at this time, making a loop travelling east, then west- a familiar pattern. 
before turning, they traveled farther east than usual.  the amber 'star' suddenly flashed three times, moved about two degrees east, then stopped. it waited about two seconds, flashed again, and flew quickly east and disappeared in an instant.
the nas jets turned west and resumed their usual route.
i came into the house, and told my wife about seeing a genuine ufo!

she had seen one in 2005, early spring, in about the same place in the sky. this was different, as she said it had the shape of a boomerang.  she had been in the hot tub, staring at the incredibly clear night sky- unusual for us. it was during a lunar eclipse, and the sky was dark.  as she watched, a shape went across the sky, from west travelling east, at about 45 degrees. the shape was obvious only due to the silouette of the shape obscuring the stars behind it. as it crossed the sky, the > shape allowed the stars to shine within the hollow of the mid-structure- so she knew it wasn't a solid triangle shape. she said it was enormous and completely silent, with no reflective or metallic quality. it took about 5 seconds to cross the full path of sight and was gone.

she had called the local astronomy director at the observatory, but he did not return her call.
content.summary: Siting in hot tub; noticed unusual amber 'star'- large. two af planes came by; it pulsed three times, moved east two degrees, pulsed once and flew east quickly and disappeared. the af jets went west. (lemoore nas)

content.detailedDescription: Husband and i driving to miramont health club about 6:30 pm, i noticed 5 orange orbs in the sky coming from the southwest, we turned off harmony rd and parked on oakridge dr. and got out of the car.  the first three orbs were in formation, 1 in front and 2 in back,  and 2 more followed them.  no noise whatsoever, they were silent and glided.  also at lower elevation, not high altitude like a plane.  unfortunately i didn't have binoculars, camera or phone.  the 5 orbs ascended as they glided by and faded into light cloud cover in the northeast part of the city.  one car stopped and the young man asked if we saw the orbs and said "what was that?", he also had video of the first 5 orbs.  we were parked by a restaurant parking lot and a group of people stopped to watch as well.  another car stopped, and the man also talked about the 5 orbs.  a woman walked by and asked if we saw the orange orbs, asking again, what was that?  as we were talking, 2 more orbs glided by together.  the man from the first car called a friend and was on the phone the whole time as we stood there.  a few minutes later, another orb showed up, and then a few minutes after that, the last orb glided by.  all headed in the same direction.  we said we hoped they were ufo's because whatever it was, it would be difficult to explain.
content.summary: 3 orbs in formation, then 2 followed; then 2 more within a couple of minutes, then single orbs several minutes apart, all at various distance between them

content.detailedDescription:
Despertã¨ muy sobresaltado, soã±aba que estaba siendo perseguido, me incorporã¨, encendã­ la liz y mirã© el reloj y eran las 4:30 am luego abrã® la ventana para recibir aire, (normalmente me vuelvo a dormir si tengo pesadillas pero estaba muy agitado mi corazã²n latã­a rã¡pido por lo intenso del sueã±o)
llovã­a levemente podã­a ver las pequeã±as goteras en la lampara de luz amarillenta del poste de alumbrado pã¹blico, respirã¨ profundamente y empecã¨ a mirar el cielo que estaba gris obscuro (me gusta mucho observar las estrellas hobbie que disfruto cuando salgo de paseo al campo) miraba extraã±ado el cielo pues no se veã­an nubes definidas era mas bien una capa uniforme a muy poca altura de un solo tono de grã­s obscuro. respirando ya menos agitado mientras continuaba mirando al cielo pensã¨ en recostarme de nuevo, pero me diã² curiosidad una pequeã±a luz que vã­,  pensã¨ que era muy casual poder ver una estrella con el cielo tan cubierto. me concentrã¨ en la luz y para mi sorpresa habã­a otra mas luego otra hasta que pude ver claramente dos largas filas muy cerca una de la otra, compuesta de pequeã±as luces blancas apenas perceptibles (no tengo un nã¹mero exacto de las luces, estas estaban a todo lo largo de la superficial que vi excepto en las ã¡reas de las puntas).
apenas fuã­ conciente de que lo que estaba sobre mi casa (barrio y ciudad) no era  normal, empecã¨ a limpiarme los ojos, lleguã¨ hasta pelliscarme, para asegurarme que no seguã­a soã±ando, ya identificadas las luces (podã­a ver el principio de ellas, pues continuaban por encima de mi casa y no podã­a verlas completas por el techo). me concentrã¨ aã¹n mã¡s siguiendo el sentido que las luces llevaban y pude ver un contorno, mas adelante de donde terminaban se destacaba unas lã­neas simples con un tono de gris ligeramente mã¡s obscuro que el resto del cielo. seguã­  las lã­neas y  pude ver claramente la punta del objeto que flotaba diagonalmente sober mi casa. 
desde mi ventana podã­a ver la punta  del objeto con un ã¡ngulo cercano a 60 grados, estimã¨ que el objeto flotaba a sã²lo 1000 metros de altura por lo que esa primera parted del objeto que vã­ tenã­a una longitud considerable. de immediate apaguã¨ la luz de la habitaciã²n abrã­  la cortina total y empecã¨ a mira's a travã¨s del vidrio y no se veã­a bien, habian reflejos y nada de contrasted, luego tratã¨ de escuchar poniendo mi oreja entre los vidrios de la celosia y no logrã¨ nada, completo silencio. volvã­ a concentrarme en las filas de luces, estaban distanciadas simã¨tricamente, pude percibir luego que la superficial no era plana, era cã²ncaba y las luces estaban en el medio, tambiã¨n que no era lisa, se asemejaba a la textura de unas ollas para cosinar (busquã¨ online y encontrã¨ unas con la textura muy similar pero de otro color. pasaron 4 minutos donde pude ver claramente esa porciã²n del objeto pero sin poder escuchar algã¹n sonido. lego el objeto empezã² a moverse lent aments, con direcciã²n norte, el contorno de lineas muy simples (un rectã¡ngulo largo con formas muy simples al principio y final del ã rea que vi claramente.) empecã¨ a agitarme me parã¨ en la cama sin dear de mirar el objector por la celosia abierta, hasty que pude ver el contorno de la parte final.
el objeto se desplazã² en lã­nea recta lentamente (diagonal a mi ventana) yo parado en mi cams mirando por la ventana no creã­a lo que estaba pasando, 30 segundos mas tarde el objecto se encontraba lejos, ya no podia ver la superficial con las luces, encambio pude ver la totalidad de la estructura. el objeto era 15 veces mas alto que ancho y 20 veces mad largo que ancho, de ancho estimo 300 metros.
el objeto desapareciã² entre bruma blanca que rodeaba las montaã±as.
no me volvã­ a dormir (no querã­a despertar creyendo que habã­a sido un sueã±o), me quedã¨ en la ventana y preguntaba a las pocas personas que pasaron si habã­an visto algo, tambien hice un dibujo del contorno de la superficie que vi claramente.
content.summary: Despertã¨ sobresaltado abrã¬ la ventana para tomar aire llovã­a y el cielo gris vi pequeã±os puntos de luz dos  filas muy largas luego pude ver la dimension de la nave que estaba directamente encima de mi casa / ciudad. al cabo de 5 minutos la nave empezã

content.detailedDescription: When i was laying down on the roof of my family house boat admiring the stars when 4 lights coming from the north east south and west came together then began to circle each other until they became a seemingly one huge circle of light then a saw a massive flash of light next thing i remember is waking up 10 hrs later the weird thing was my brand new casio watch stopped at 11:26 pm i tried everything the next day to get the watch to begin telling time again but it was frozen i finally had to take the battery out of the watch and put it back in after that night the watch worked perfectly never once had an issue with it
content.summary: 4 ufo's came together from n e s w then began to circle

content.detailedDescription: I was about 12 years old, babysat neighbors kids. they came home, lady paid me, and stood on her porch as i walked home. as i walked westerly, a soft blue light suddenly covered everything around me. i could see my long shadow ahead of me, so i instinctively turned around to see where the source of the light was coming from. there was what seemed like a submarine shaped object in the sky over the beach or ocean, at about 32 degrees above the horizon, just sitting there hovering in one place. as i stared at it i noticed it wasn't like a submarine, but a disk, and i was seeing it in an elliptical shape as the side view which made it seem almost cigar shaped. it had a low conning tower type raised thing on top with circular windows or light in equal distances apart, going all around the top, or at least i assume they continued around it. the blue light bathed me and something held me there, unable to move. it felt as if a short time had passed but it made me feel as if i'd been there a long time because it left me very tired. i'm guessing only a minute or so, yet it always made me wonder because of the fatigue. my gaze was glued to it as it just stayed in that one spot, and then it seemed to just move ever so slightly and was gone in a blink of an eye. i was standing there in the middle of the dirt road flabbergasted, and heard the ladies voice in an excited "oh my!", turned, and we both exclaimed at the same time, "did you see that?!! it was a ufo!!!" my mouth and her mouth were wide open, our eyes, too. i ran home and woke up my family, got my telescope and tripod out, laid on a chaise lawn chair and gazed skyward for another hour, but never saw it again. i've seen two more ufo's in my lifetime, but both were much different than the first one. but because there was a witness, i knew it couldn't possibly be my imagination. had a witness for the second one, too. the third was in broad daylight as i was going to work, so many people had to have seen it, it was huge.I don't want to write a book here so i'll leave you with that much. i just wanted to at least mention my first sighting since it made the biggest impact on my life. i'm 64 now and disabled. i had a long career at kennedy space center. space became my life. i'd love to meet them.
content.summary: Eliptical with a conning tower with lights around it, like portholes lit up, cast a soft blue light over me. had neighbor observe as well.

content.detailedDescription:
Thursday february 5, 2015
visitors
sometime during the night i had a visit from a friend. as every evening is the same nothing has change until earlier this morning around midnight.  my family is home and tv volume is going thru the night. then, suddenly i was not in my room.
since, last friday until now two members of my family and i have been fighting the flu. it has been one of those weeks nothing went right. being sick is for the birds. now as wednesday came i am still not up to full strength to be better. later that evening i went to bed earlier. watching tv until about 10:00 pm. fell asleep watching the news on keyetv. my tv was set on timer so it would go of by itself.
as my sleep went on i found myself next to a river with is a big water fall. i remember someone walking next to me talking. also, a child was walking with me as we wanted to run around. the waterfall and walkway was all silver. i am trying to run to the edge of the water wanting to catch fish. they seem bigger than me. i remember building lights as home on the edge of the mountain next to the river. even thought i was seeing a world from a different place i was so at peace. this person seem to know i needed help badly. we walked as we have been walking all day for hours and it was beautiful too see a world different from ours. 
then i walked into a room that look like an operation room as the whole room was all silver. this person was helping me to the table asking me to lay on my stomach. first ask me to turn up on my left side next to a rail. then i was ask to put my arm up over my head. something was holding my hands up over my head. i saw 3 people like nurses coming in and a person like a doctor by my head. one next to my head, 1 by my left side and right side, then one by my lower back all laying there hand on me. these 4 people all wearing a whitish gray color. the person like a doctor was in a blackest to blue color outfit and being a lady with long hair. i ask them to show me the spot they were going to work on. exactly the spot you could not touch my back. then all i saw was 4 silver proves coming down to my back. 
then i remember screaming from the severe pain. then someone touch my back it pop and the pain stop. i woke up in my room on my stomach with my hands on the railing holding on. as i woke up i could feel no more pain in my lower back, legs and hips. my son walked into my room then as i told him what happened. i had him look at my back and he saw no marks on my lower back. i told my son i could feel my legs with no more severe pain.
i still have pressure in my lower back but, now a person can touch my lower back. it is like there is no nerve pressure pain. even though i cannot tell you if this is true or not, they do not come during the day. what happened to me is it real or a dream and why did my family not hear anything they were home. the day before this visit you could not touch my lower back for 3 years and now after this you can.

seeing my son
                                                                                                                  wednesday-1/7/2015 

during tuesday night as i always say went to bed earlier. it was a cool night so not much to do.
nothing different was going to happened that i could tell. during the night i lay back watching tv for a few minutes. the tv was to shut off by a timer set for 60 minutes.

during the night i found myself standing in a room of all silver with 3 doors ways. everything was silver even where i was standing. suddenly, i saw a person with black hair that looks like me and my son whom has black hair. it had to be my youngest son i have not seen in years since he is not of this world. i remember another person in front of me as he was next to a different doorway.

sudden, i fell down and this young man walked over and caught me telling this other person i was injury. i remember my son picking me up and carrying me back to a room. he would not let anyone near me. then i woke up wednesday morning tell my son’s here they had a brother.
one call me crazy and the other son was glad he had a younger brother. i told both my boys he is not from this earth. he could not live here on earth.



sunday 2/1/2015
trying to get over the flu with other members of my family sick with this illness. someone had to take care of our family. i was the only one that was getting up after feeling that my brain was being fried from fever the night before. no, i had just run 101 fever friday to saturday evening. by sunday i was up but, moving slow.
that night i went to the kitchen to try to cook some soup for everyone that was sick. as i was washing a pot out i look out the small kitchen window for what reason i don’t know. as, i was looking out the window i call my husband to come to the kitchen window to see this huge yellow light down the road. before he could get up the light was so big that it disappear in less than a bling of an eye. there was no other lights that look like that then vanish.
i saw the traffic on fm 812 moving back and forth. there was nothing moving at all no other lights on it. it was bigger than the spot light on star flight. never seen a light that just sat there not move at all then vanish.
content.summary: I was inside the craft

content.detailedDescription:
My aunt told to she was going to work early in morning (walking ) turned the corner and their was a flying saucer in the street with police cars.
police told her to move along . later that day a man in a suit came up to her 
in the store (sears) and tolds her to not say anything about what she saw . 
when she went home after work the ground was discolored. and the next day the 
 the city was paveing the street. 

this took place in the early 1960 . 

told the story many times over the years always the same .

have you ever heard of this before ?

thank you jim
content.summary: Ufo was landed in the street

content.detailedDescription: As i was walking my dog and sleeping giant state park the dog started acting a little funny naturally i thought he had to use the bathroom so as i was waiting i went to light a cigarette and i caughta light in the corner of my eye. it looks like it was traveling really slow but as it change directions in its path i knew it couldn't be a shooting star or meteor had a greenish white dull light and left a trail of lights behind it as it moved through the night sky it was one of the most beautiful things i think i've ever saw because i always believed but i finally saw with my own eyes i was so astonished that it didn't even occur to me to run to my truck to retrieve my cell phone to get a picture i'll probably always regret not getting a picture of it since then i bought a telescope and i'm watching the night sky because they are out there
content.summary: I was walking my dog at sleeping giant state park in hamden connecticut between 9 and 10 pm when my dog started acting up i went to light a cigarette and the ufo caught the corner of my eye.  it was beautiful

content.detailedDescription: I just stated  this
content.summary: I was watching an odd large plane turn in the sky then noticed a bright light high in the sky speeding across the skyline and i couldn't keep my focus on it but i did try to take a video but it doesn't show anything but i will keep it

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It was a cold morning with a relatively clear cold sky. i was sitting in my vehicle, in the parking lot of my college waiting to attend class. i noticed a bright light in the sky and then another that followed it. i immediately knew something was out of the ordinary. both objects moved directly straight up. it seemed as if one is chasing the other. the chaser on bottom gave off a trail like a normal jet or airliner. the chased on top did not give off any trail. but they are both moving extremely fast and seem the be keeping the same distance. also moving straight up. they are obviously moving the same extreme speed. while one is leaving its trail and the other just seems to be floating fast straight up. the chased top object appeared to be extemely shiny, just like it was solid chrome. the object overall was round but had solid sharp edges. both objects where rather large. as the objects acsended into the sky two streaks of firery, electric looking light streaked through the sky sideways. this happened twice and you can see in the video. i felt totally confused at what i was seeing and almost had to "snap back" into the life that was around me. i then lost sight of the objects as they continued there path straight upward. i was greatful i was able to capture this on video.
content.summary: Two objects chasing in sky. one chrome the other gave a trail. the sky then have a streak of fire two times.

content.detailedDescription:
Blue moon like object over i-710 freeway..

over noticing object over this spot portion of that traffic sudden stopped for a few moments everyone stalled.
content.summary: Blue orb/moon like

content.detailedDescription: I was driving at night and approaching a tunnel about 1\2 mile ahead. everything just went dark i thought that's strange the tunnel lights are off then i realized i was sitting on the side of the freeway in my car and things started getting bright again. my radio was static and it was clearing, that's when i realized i was sitting at the tunnel entrance and there was this very deep hum in my head. my car was running but missing. i was trying to figure out what the hell  is going on. so before i put my car in gear i thought what time is it i was married with a wife and young daughter at home. that's when i realized i couldn't move my arms i was tingly all over but my movements were coming back' this is when i panic set in. i finally got it together and took off i drove through the tunnel and just couldn't hold it together and had to pull over, i was freaking out and couldn't figure why. so i got out of my car to get some air and a highway patrol officer pulled up and asked what was wrong and said i looked white as a ghost his light on me i was very weak he helped me sit down and thought i was drinking and i wasn't but then he said the thing i'll never forget [its 1 am just wondering what your doing stopped on the side of the road] i looked at my watch and it read 11:01. i of course never said anything to him so buy the time he got back with my license i had closed my door and he let me go.  to this day i never told anyone but it has haunted me for over 40 years. i do watch stuff and it seems everyone sees lights and craft and all kinds of stuff.  i saw nothing. but something took 2 hours of my life that has caused great concern over the past 40 years. i had no history if blackouts and to this day have never had one. i have done some things that i'm not proud of maybe we all have but its so hard to explain. something happened to me that night and i really would like to know if anyone else has had my experience. i could tell you more about dreams i think they are dreams i at this time am so nervous this is as i said the first time talking about it. i will tell you this i can tell you where i think i was i have this vision of something that seems crazy but if you would like to hear it email me and i guess i would be willing to talk more  sorry for taking up so much time but after all this time i had to finally tell someone.  thank you very much. p.S. my wife was asleep but i stayed up all night just looking out the window at the dark in a daze then just went to work and it took awhile but continued with my life somehow!
content.summary: I was driving and lost 2 hrs of my life no lights just black

content.detailedDescription: I was driving at the time of witness. i was on my way home from work when i noticed three objects in the sky. there was a plane to the right so i could tell it wasn't a plane. the objects didn't flicker or flash. they just remained at a constant brightness. they appeared to move but i really couldn't tell. i knew they weren't stars because they disappeared by the time i reached home and you could tell they were a lot closer. by the time i got home where i was going to further look at the object and they were gone so i am not sure where and exactly when they disappeared. i tried to take a picture but the lights didn't show up in the picture.
content.summary: I was driving near the above address at night when i saw three bright objects.

content.detailedDescription: Last year 2014 feb. 12th driving home to la from bakersfeild ca , driving south on i 5 freeway. the time was around 3 or 4 pm with mostly clear skies except the clouds that were in front of me . then i noticed a sharp edges of the inside if the cloud . thinking that it was a cloud and the sharp round edges will brake up as the cloud moves . it did not brake up and now it has been about 5 miles and it stayed part in the cloud staying ahead of me . lost it after i got off for gas.
content.summary: As i am driving south on high way 5 it stayed ahead of me for miles .

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting a few freinds on holloween night 2014 i had modifide my battery powered electric guitar amplifier so i could carry it and play my electric guitar while riding my mountain bike.L had just finished talking with an old highschool friend in front of his familes home near chabot colledge on depot rd in hayward ca is was around 11:00 at night when i was ready to leave my friend and head to my home near mount eden high school another friend of mine sam was at the friends house that i was leaving fron and he asked me if i was riding home and if he could join me i said yes so we both rode south towards my home on florida st we turned left onto sleepyhollow ave then right onto portsmouth st portsmouth turns into arf ave when you pass lorn eden elementary school located on the left hand side of the street.We were getting near lorn eden elemetary school when sam said what the heck is that i looked in the direction he was looking and saw what looked like a small orange pinkish star hovering directly above the school i told sam i think i can get its attention content://media/external/file/2644i turned on my battery powered guitar amp turned up the volume on my electric guitar to almost full volume and started playing a guitar solo as we rode passed the school sure enough the ufo started to travel east in our same direction at our same speed as i kept playing the guitar i. had been riding bicycles while playing acoustic guitar for a while so i was good at riding while playing guitar at the time of this sighting. the ufo continued to fallow us east down arf ave flying about twenty feet above the rooftops of the condo's when we reached hesperian blvd i rode up to the stop light directly across the street from mrs rotten robbies gas station on the corner of pannama st the next street that arf turns into. i was still playing the guitar while i was pushing the button on the street sign to cross. the street when the ufo came down from above the last rooftop and hovered directly above me about fifteen feet in the air i could see it clearly and i saw thousands of finger lenth pink sparks all sparking simultaniously i was so stuck on this viewing that the sign to cross the street had already changed from cross back to wait again i was still playing the guitar whole time from the school untill right after i noticed the crosswalk signal changed from walk to don't. walk.Then as i was looking up at it i stopped playing the guitar and as soon as i stopped the sparks started to shut off one at a time until i saw the last spark stop and i was looking up where it was and saw nothing just blackness i turned to sam and said did you see that ? and he said yes i did and i said to him that was a ufo and said it could have been one of those chinese floating paper baloons with a candle in it and i said those things dont fallow you down the street and they don't fly down to where your at and hover above you with sparks and he said maybe it was a drone and i said i'm so tired of everyone saying that ufos" are drones i told him you can be in denial all you want but i know for a fact that what we just saw was a genuine. ufo it was gone as far as i could tell so we continued on our way riding to the house on florida st i wasn't playing guitar i was just riding and looking up but not seeing anything so i just stopped looking we made a left turn onto calaroga ave heading south as we were turning left onto florida st he said what not again,i looked southeast and hovering directly above the elementary schoolformaly known aseureka there was the star looking ufo again sam said we're almost to the house lets just go home and i said hell no its not everyday that i get to see a ufo that close up and i started riding towarrds it he sighed and reluctantly fallowed me i turned my amp back on turned up my guitar and started lead soloing again and once again it started fallowing us we made a left onto catalpa st and it came out over the roofs of the houses i turned my amp up full blast and didn't realize untill cars were driving around me on both sides that i was jamming in the middle of the street with a ufo hovering only twenty feet above me it was such a rush i was captivated then i guess the ufo thought i was putting myself in danger so it flew away
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A star like ufo fallows two bicyclists on halloween night 2014

content.detailedDescription: Ok  here we go i work at viking yacts in south jersey ,was out back at around 5:45 am 2/11/15 smoking before i had to go in to work for my shift.I look up in the sky and saw ten to fifteen strobing lights in the sky no red or green lights like an air craft plane or hellacopter . im a big aviation fan i no my air craft.It was moving slow from south to north my best guess.I told three other guys out back of the boat works to look up at the lights we were all amazed at what we were seeing? never was anything like that in all my years im 46 years old,after work i went on the net to see if any air craft would have that many strobesflashing at one tine  maybe a kc 10  military i couldend find nothing,wasent a blimp too fast for a blimp.If you guys no of any aircraft with that many strobes let me no  thanks  if you want to talk i no three other people that saw the same thing. thanks  [name and phone number removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Over ten stobe light blinkin 4 witnesses the objet was big ans seemed far away?

content.detailedDescription: We were coming home one night, when my wife asked me what that is in the sky. from my side of the truck i could not see it, but when i turned to the right and down a hill...There it was. a large craft the size of a football field. i was near my mothers house so i drove down the hill to her house, and it was right in front of us, i ran in my mothers house to get her to see it. when i came back out it was gone...My wife said it just disappeared. some people on the street also saw it.
content.summary: Large saucer shape still behide and above my mothers neighbors house, my wife was in the truck with me. i am looking for someone to put me under, and they me more.

content.detailedDescription: On dec.24,2013 was out at mitani swa fora early morning duck hunt. time was 4am clear skies and cold out. was setting decoys at the point were two rivers come together. the platte river prouder river. i looked up to the west sky and i saw a disk shaped object moving out of the nw sky. it stopped moving in a path and hovered for a few seconds and then started to move in different directions. it moved up down forward backward left to right. it was changing colors from red to green blue yellow orange. i observed the object for about 15-20 min. before the object left the sky i saw a white object come out of the sky from the sw  as it was coming down the disk object moved towards the white object. then the white object exploded like aa big firework shot from the sky towards the ground. there was no noise when that happened . the disk object then moved track to the nw and then disappeared at  a unknown speed towards the west and was gone. i had my phone with me and i noticed that it was not working like it should. and after 3-8 min after the disk left my phone was working normal. i'm a retired law enforcement and i have seen some things in my life but nothing like i saw that night. i've been back to the same place several times and have never seen it again.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Awsome to see something move that fast and scared at the same time

content.detailedDescription: Fishing with three others. observed bright white light in woods.  light rose, decended, rose, decended, rose above trees, hovered, moved stright line to river, shuddered, started to move down river toward us.  we took off driving awaw from river as fast as we could.  last saw objec about area where we were located, shuggered, and rose stright up and vanished.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright light in woods.  moved up and down in trees, moved toward river and hovered over river, shuggered and moved in my direction

content.detailedDescription: In korea approximately 1957 and ten years after my first sighting.  close to pucson, korea, observed 3 lights at different locations in the sky come on like a light comes on.  the objects moved at a high rate of speed in a stright line towards each other.  the lights stopped after meeting, squiggled around and departed in three different directions, and vanished.
content.summary: In korea. observed three lights come on like light.  traveled stright line to each other stopped, squiggled around and departed in 3 diff directions & vanished

content.detailedDescription:
I was flying a delta airlines flight from minneapolis international airport to chicago's o'hare international airport on december 26th, 2014 around 9:00 am or so (i'm unsure of exact departure time off the top of my head.) what felt like maybe 5 or 10 minutes after take off our plane had just broken through cloud cover and being that my phone was on "air plane mode" i figured it would be cool to take some pictures of the clouds because i don't get to fly a lot. my seat was somewhat positioned between 2 windows so to make sure i got at least 1 good shot, i took 4 pictures in total (just to be clear, the 5th photo is a zoomed in "screen shot" of the 4th photo object. the first picture was taken out of the window that was closer to the passenger in front of me (object in top left corner), the 2nd photo was taken out of the window that was closer to the passenger behind me (no object), and the last 2 photos were from the same window as the 1st (object again in almost the same top left location). 

after taking the photos i had looked up and saw that no one else had any electronic devices out so i thought maybe i should put it away. because of this i didn't look at the photo's i had taken until we landed otherwise i would for sure have taken more and probably even a video..So sorry about that. : / once i had time to look them over i was pretty excited to see if they turned out well, but didn't expect them to be this interesting. i have never really thought about ufo's or things like this before but when i first saw these pictures i really had no doubt in my mind that this was something not normally seen by many...I showed my uncle and he thought it was a plane and gave it no more than a 2 second glance...I suppose it could be military or something but i don't know what plane goes that high up considering my plane was more than likely already half way to cruising altitude (maybe between 10 and 20 thousand feet) at time of taking these...Also, when zoomed in on the photos (especially the 4th one) i can't see any resemblance of a plane at all. no wings or tail or anything...I see a grey-ish triangle or pyramid shaped object with significantly strict uniformed edges and absolutely no sign of any trail coming from it like a plane at that altitude might have. all in all, i decided to not just keep it on my phone with out telling anyone so here i am a month and a half later giving it to people who might know more. 

also, just in case anyone is wondering, i emailed myself the photos from my "gallery" on my iphone and saved then to my computer to upload to this site...Other than that, nothing has been tampered with, edited, cropped, cut, or anything else like that...As i stated earlier, the 5th picture here is simply just a zoomed in and "screen shot" version of the object in the 4th photo. thanks and have a good day!
content.summary: Took pictures from plane window as we broke the clouds and unintentionally captured the object/s on 3 of 4 photos taken.

content.detailedDescription:
It was the day sputnix was to pass over.  i had just gotten home from work. lived in garage appartment. was taking off my shoes when i look up and saw object that seemed as high as the stars would have been. heading west to east.  i called local radio station to find out what sputtnix looked like.  guy at radio statation dropped phone and left to see sputnix.
i went back outside and watched it.  all of a suggen it stopped, did not move for a few seconds.  all of a sudden it went crazy sort of running around itself.  all of a sudden it took off stright south at a great speed and vanished.

at first i thought i had sighted sputnix. when i realized i had not, i thought ufo.  i thought do not tell anyone because they would think i was nuts.
content.summary: Flew same day as sputnix. flew west to east, straight line, stopped, squiggled around & head south at great speed

content.detailedDescription: On july 2013 i did the photo with my motorolla celular phone at 08:30 am rio de janeiro brazil
content.summary: A ufo look like saturn planet but it's impossible, so big
content.locationName: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro

content.detailedDescription: Around 7:20pm i looked up at orion, as i do most nights.  in my peripheral vision to the right, i noticed an impossibly bright 'star'.  it was low in the sky and looked far away.  as i watched, it dimmed down to a faint reddish glow, for about a minute, then went back to the bright white color.  every so often it would do this.  after about 30 minutes, i got in the car and drove toward it, watching the whole time.  it was in the western sky.  i came to a low area with trees, and lost sight of it.  when i came upon a ridge, it was gone.
content.summary: Very bright, brighter than sirius.  every so often it would dim down to redish glow.  stationary.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: On august 1st 2012 i was sitting in a hot tub with my wife mother in law father in law.My children were sleep in the house.I see two bright orbs come straight down from the sky in a swirly pattern and fly straight out to sea. moments later they come back in a swirly pattern and fly directly straight back over head. as if they were going back to the original destination of origin.They made no sound. at this point i look at my father in law and said did you see that he said yes.The vantage point of my mother in law and wife were against the house and they could not see the lights. i said to my father in law what do you think. his opinion was there helicopters. i disputed this with him because they made no sound at all.Later on i witnessed two black helicopters one with the green light on inside.They were to blackhawk helicopters i can make them out by the silhouette given off from the buildings lights. at this point in time i have grabbed my binoculars and my camera to see if i could see them again. i checked all that week on my surf trip but did not see anything else.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Sitting with wife, mother in law, and father in law. at rented house on surf trip.

content.detailedDescription:
The summer of'76 late night or early morning.I got out of bed and went to the window. over the trees at the far side of the house was a bright white perfect pyramid craft. my first thought was it was a two man ship.The mainbody of it was bright white and spun rapidly but it flew straight. on one point was a blue light on one tip a green light and on the other tip was    white light. part of me remembers a red light somewhere anyway,my room was at one end of the house and when i first saw it, it it was at the far side of the house,i remember touching my eyes to make sure i was awake it was maybe20,25feet off the ground maybe10 feet away from the side of the house slowly flying parallel to the second floor of the house. there was no sound, at first i was amazed then i thought if i can see it they can see me then i had an overwhelming feeling of dread and fear.I ran to the closet
and hid. i remember seeing the bright light under the door and then i'm in my mom's room crying and she's telling me to go back to sleep my dad walked me back to my room and my friend who was sleeping over said she saw something in the neighbors drive way.Next thing i know i'm coming home from school the next day then when my dad got home he tol qd my mom that she should have believed me cause in the paper was an article that said the town about30minutes away saw the same thing i saw. after that she always looked at the sky she wanted to see them too. iwas13when that happened i'm 51now i can't talk about it without crying even after all these years i don't know what happened to make me cry when i think about it still . i do have a lot of dreams about ships in the sky and i see the the tall shining blonde beautiful people. but i had to tell someone about my sighting even though it was a long time ago.I'm still a little scared that the "men in black"will come to the door.  if you think i could help i'd talk to you i've seen triangle ufo's on your show some are similar but not quite.I'm willing to do hypnosis just to put my
mind to rest. thank you for listening.
[item moved/cms/nd]
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: What appeared to be a 2man perfect pyrimid craft  outside my house

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of 2-9-15 around 7:00pm i was in my backyard with my dogs when i gazed at the sky and saw at what first appeared to be a satellite since it was silent. it was moving faster than any satellite i have ever seen and almost seemed to have some sort of shape or outline as i noticed it directly above my house. there were no flashing lights to indicate it was an aircraft. i watched it for a little over a minute it seemed as it headed northeast over grand traverse bay at a steady clip. as it reach the treeline it was no longer visible. i had to go to the store anyway so a minute later i jumped in my vehicle and thought i would try to follow it. i sped into a resort parking lot overlooking the bay. i thought at this point i would definitely see it since there was perfect visibility. it may have changed course or possibly i was looking in the wrong direction but it was no where to be seen.
content.summary: Bright star-like object, silenty moving ne across east grand traverse bay

content.detailedDescription:
on february 03, 2015, i was picking up a 5th wheel camper trailer that was in a subdivision approx. 5 miles north of town . while wandering around some junk, sipping on a beer(which i soon spilled all over myself in the commotion) letting the new camper owner dig out the flat in the frozen ground, i noticed a bright surging light in a spot where there is no beacons or such in the sky. the light was staying in the same place and appeared to be dimming a bit. it looked like a heavy aircraft with all its lights and headed right toward us. there is an airport on that side of town. by this time i am freaking out telling my buddy to look. well, it just so happened, that the campers' owner had a nice 30x spotting scope with a tripod which he quickly set up and got the light focused in. a quick look at the time, 6:00pm sharp. so, as its killing me to look thru the scope, i encouraged him to set the scope well and get a good look. seeing that i did not know the particulars of it. never taking my eyes off of the light in sky, it was finally my turn to look. once my eye adjusted and i quit wiggling, the lights, were awesome to say the least. quick side note, a few seconds into viewing an orb flew behind the lights. it moved west to east leaving a small trail which disappeared quickly. the orb only appeared for less than a second. its fair to say the orb was moving at a high rate of speed. and no other orbs were seen that evening. the lights located in the middle of the craft were mainly white in the middle and had a rainbow of colors on the top and bottom of the light assembly. there were 2 lights which appeared an inch or so apart in the scope. these lights were arranged in a vertical fashion. however, while viewing the lights with the naked eye, there only appeared to be one light. the lower light was only a quarter of the brightness of the upper light. the craft had structure!! while the lights were surging and appeared to be at there brightest, you could actually see dark structure between the lights. the lower light appeared dimmer, but i think its because there was structure in the way. but, that's it, no definable edges or shapes, almost seemed like a blob with some crazy lights. the weather at the time was approx. 40 degrees f, wind gusts to 15mph i would say and the sky conditions were as follows, typical fading bright blue sky but there was this system of dark clouds moving in from the east moving west. there was also a full moon coming up and really illuminated the back side of the clouds moving in. to my best guess i would say the craft to have been 15-20 miles away. by this time its getting dark enough to get the camper down the road do to the lights half ass working and questionable tires. this is the cool part! i got the camper pulled out of the spot it was in and then into a more level spot and turned the truck off. we walked back down to pick up tools and such,as we watched for the light as much as possible. we got everything picked up and, as i was walking back up to my truck looking back as much as possible. the camper owner is fumbling around looking for his keys so i am walking kinda slow waiting to see if he finds them, when, all of the sudden, just as i happened to be looking at the craft, a bright green light appeared above the craft like a door opening, and then light appeared. the light could have even been projected. just as fast as the light appeared, it disappeared. for only about 3 seconds. i kept waiting for something to happen, but nothing did. the rainbow lights just kept doing there surging thing. so, i watched the light on the way back to town and the only thing that changed was that  the clouds were moving ever closer to covering the light. well, by the time i got home, the clouds had covered all of the light. when i first discovered the light, i called my girlfriend and told her to go outside and look. she also found the light in the sky. she watched it for a little bit and claims the light moved slowly up and down. i could not see that movement where i was at. since i have seen the light i have been asking everyone i know and two other people besides us three seen the light. my credentials for giving an accurate testimony is that i received my a&p certificate in 1993. i ate and breathed aviation for 15 yrs of my life as a mechanic and flight mechanic and feel i have a pretty good handle on things that fly in the sky. i'm not quite sure what kind of craft it was but i defiantly seen my first ufo!!!


[item moved/cms/nd]
codywyoming
content.summary: The lights are what caught my eye, 2 each, the top light was brighter and rainbowish. the best is the burst of green light which was visible for 2-3 sec. oh and an orb too
